Отличное продолжение!

Portal 2 запоминается более разнообразным геймплеем, в сравнение с первой частью, а так же более глубоким уклоном в сюжетную составляющую.

Графика и звук в игре на очень высоком уровне.
Геймплей к сожалению наскучивает ближе к концу, так как продолжительность игры увеличена почти в 2 раза, но стоит отметить, что это компенсируется неожиданными поворотами сюжета, и новыми головоломками.

Отличное продолжение отличной игры.
Но 3 часть думаю уже не нужна. 

Личная оценка:
8,5/10

+ Графика
+ Сюжетные повороты
+ Разнообразие головоломок
- Затянутый геймплей

Это божественно, жаль, что Гейб умеет считать только до двух

Un juego impresionante y fantastico, donde cada detalle es maravilloso y cada conversacion - mas bien monologos - te hacen reir.
Jugabilidad: La tipica mezcla de 1a persona y puzzle...  Eso es lo que diria si no estuviera refiriendome a un juego unico en su genero, donde cada giro de esquina es una sorpresa.
Tecnologia: Utilizacion buena del motor fisico y, aunque antiguo, del motor grafico Source, que sigo dando guerra despues de 5 años.
Graficos: Buenos, no extremadamente detallados, pero tampoco son de PS2.
Sonidos: Banda sonora genial, en cuanto efectos y a musica, me parece una de las mejores bandas sonoras de un videojuego
Innovacion: Ya innovo en su primera parte, en la segunda hizo que el 1er juego fuera una especie de beta de la segunda parte.
Ya todo esta dicho. Un juego unico que no deberia faltar en tu coleccion y que ya solo por la carisma de sus personajes merece su compra

Tak jak w przypadku pierwowzoru w dalszym ciągu jest to gra logiczno zręcznościowa, z kilkoma nowymi bajerami oraz bogatszą szatą graficzną i ciekawszą fabułą. Mając na ekwipunku teleporter pokonujemy kolejne poziomy. Dodatkowym atutem gry jest tryb kooperacji, w którym każdy musi odegrać swoja rolę. Gra ze znajomym dostarcza jeszcze więcej radości – co dwie głowy, to nie jedna ;) Zdecydowanie warto zagrać.

I really love this game.

I am a person who really likes difficult puzzle games, especially ones with nice story and dialog.

Portal 2 I found to be too easy though. It wasn't as challenging as I wanted. I like the humor and dialog a lot though. Weatley and GlaDOS are pretty meniaclly hilarious. I liked Portal 1 better because the voice of GlaDOS was a little more robotic and believeable, and the puzzles were a little tougher.

I liked Portal 2 because it was longer, and there was more to it. Overall it is a great game, good music, great visuals, and voice acting, and at times has challenging puzzles. You should play it as well as Portal 1.

The thing that keeps me coming back time and again to this game is the community created content called Community Chambers. You can download test chambers made by members of the community for both Co-Op and Solo. You can also create test chambers of your own just using the vanilla game. I LOVE that feature. It gives the game INFINITE replayability. Some of the maps that people make can be really tough too, and I like that. You can continue to play maps made by the community, and there will always be more than you can even play because people keep making them.

That is the main reason why I got this game for Steam when I already had it for Xbox360. On Xbox you cannot play community content or make your own maps. 

Even if you have this game for console you should try it on steam for community chambers. I highly recommend it. You can play chambers for hours.

Buy it for INFINITE replayability!

Easily one of the best, if not the best, physics puzzle games I've ever had the pleasure of playing. There's really nothing I could say about this game that could do it justice in how nice it is. Extremamente divertid, o jogo mantem-se fiel, tanto à sua prequela, como o seu nome. Sendo o segundo lançamento, Portal 2 prossegue a história de uma mulher presa num enorme laboratório repleto de camaras para testar as várias inveções criadas lá, nomeadamente a "portal gun", à medida que se prossegue pelas salas consegue-se perceber melhor o passado do laboratório e a razão pelo qual foi abandona durante muitos anos. O modo de jogador unico é extremamente divertid em si, tendo isso em conta, o modo multiplayer online conteve uma tremenda quantide de expectativas altas e, felizmente, conseguiu superar essas expectativas, com os seus inovadores e desafiantes mapas, novas ferramentas apropriadas para o modo de jogo e a criação de novas personagens divertidas para este modo.

No final Portal 2 será um jogo para lembrar e que possivelmente possa mudar a industria em si.

Infelizmente, só tem um problema... O facto da Valve não saber contar até 3!
